import React,{useState} from 'react' function FunctionalFormHandling() { const [name, setName]=useState( {firstName:'', lastName:''}) const [val,setVal] = useState([]) const formSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } return (
formSubmit(e)} className='col-lg-4 col-md-7 col-sm-8 border px-4 py-3 was-validated' autoComplete='off'>
setName({...name,firstName:e.target.value})} required />
please fill this required field
you entered
setName({...name,lastName:e.target.value})} required />
please fill this required field
you entered
{`${JSON.stringify(name)}`}
) } export default FunctionalFormHandling
